WellnessScoreCard.title: Your Daily Wellness Score
WellnessScoreCard.description: This score is calculated from the tone of your latest journal entry, combined with streak and consistency bonuses.

mood.positive: Your recent reflections show a very positive tone 🎉
mood.neutral: You're doing well — keep journaling to strengthen your streak!
mood.negative: Try writing today to boost your wellness score and build consistency.

streak.longest: You're on your longest streak yet! 🔥
streak.short: You're {{count}} day{{count > 1 ? 's' : ''}} away from your longest streak. Keep going!

TipCard.title: Tip of the Day
TipCard.noMoodIntro: No recent mood detected. Here's a general tip:
TipCard.moodIntro: Based on your last entry, you felt {{mood}}.

AddJournalEntry.title: Add Journal Entry
AddJournalEntry.loader: We're in this together! Reflecting on what you shared...

error.empty: A problem shared is a problem halved. Please share your thoughts.

Alert.deleteEntryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Alert.errorDeletingEntryDescription: Error deleting entry. Please try again.

General.title: General
General.description: Setup notifications, theme and language preferences.

Account.title: Account
Account.description: Manage your profile and account-related settings.

Support.title: Support
Support.description: Get help, send feedback, and learn more about Myndscape.

Theme.title: Theme
Theme.description: Choose your app theme - light, dark, or system default.

Language.title: Language
Language.description: Select your preferred language for the app.

Subscription.title: Subscription & Billing
Subscription.description: Manage your subscription plan and payment methods.

DeleteAccount.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.

SceneOne.title: Your Safe space, always
SceneOne.description: Share how you’re feeling — Myndscape listens without judgment.

SceneTwo.title: Mood Support
SceneTwo.description: Get gentle tips, reflections, and activities designed to lift your mood and brighten your lifestyle, one step at a time.

SceneThree.title: Grow With Myndscape
SceneThree.description: Watch your emotional patterns, build healthier habits, and discover calm — with an AI buddy that evolves with you.

Username.title: Hi there! 👋
Username.description: I’m Myndscape — your journaling companion. What’s your name or nickname? I’d love to call you something personal.

EmotionalCheckIn.title: Emotional Check-In 💭
EmotionalCheckIn.description: If you had to sum up how your days usually feel, what would you say?

Bio.title: Tell us about yourself
Bio.description: What’s your story? Share a little about who you are, what you love, and what makes you YOU!.

Alert.errorDescription: There was an error saving your profile info. Please try again.

LoginScreen.title: Sign Up or Login
LoginScreen.description: Please enter your email address to get started.

Alert.errorDescription: There was an error sending the access link. Please try again.
Alert.successDescription: We sent you a magic link to log in. Please check your inbox.

ValidationError.email: Please enter a valid email address.

Description.premium: You currently have a premium subscription. You can downgrade to our free plan and keep enjoying journaling, mood tracking, and insights without losing everything.
Description.free: We’re sad to see you go 💔. If you delete your account, all your entries, mood history, reminders, and personalized insights will be permanently deleted.

Alerts.errorDescription: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again later.

HistoryScreenHeader.title: History
HistoryScreenHeader.description: Browse and reflect on your past entries

FAQs.title: FAQs
FAQs.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions
